title: RecipeShare
description: A collaborative cooking app to store, share, and modify recipes

title: Lambda Blockchain
description: A simple blockchain web-app to mine lambda-school (LS) cryptocurrency, add transactions, and view the entire blockchain.  Using SHA-256 for block hashing and a Proof of Work Algorithm

title: Pytower
description: A simple yet fun game where you have to get to the treasure room.  Pick up weapons and items, and watch out for enemy attacks!

title: LS8 CPU
description: An 8 bit CPU, exploring low level computer architecture concepts. Simulated and built with Python.

title: Jazeera
description: A series of scripts written in Node.js to automate a series of steps to mine a JazeeraCoin.  An Automated Graph Traversal to explore a 500 rooms on an unexplored island, A script to collect 1000 gold by picking up and selling items at the shop.  Another script to purchase a username, a script to decipher and decode Assembly code, and finally a script to mine a Jazeera coin.  the traversal of a player through a 500 room island maze.

title: Got Github
description: A simple web app, displaying info for any user on github.com. Leveraging the github API

title: IMDb Movies
description: Simple Movie Searching and Favoriting.  Leveraging the IMDb API

title: Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website, displaying all the projects and info right here, written in Gatsby.js, hosted in Amazon S3

title: Smurf Village
description: A simple app to add custom smurfs to the smurf village.  Built to leverage the redux state management Library

title: Star Wars Cards
description: A fun display of star wars characters with light saber sound effects. Leveraged the SWAPI Api. (https://swapi.co/) Built to leverage Redux, the react-sound library, and redux-thunk for API requests with redux.

title: Replate
description: An API built for a Web App that seeks to reduce excess food wastage, by connecting Restaurants with Volunteers available to pickup leftover food

title: Jazeera
description: A series of scripts written in Node.js to automate a series of steps to mine a JazeeraCoin.  An Automated Graph Traversal to explore a 500 rooms on an unexplored island, A script to collect 1000 gold by picking up and selling items at the shop.  Another script to purchase a username, a script to decipher and decode Assembly code, and finally a script to mine a Jazeera coin.  the traversal of a player through a 500 room island maze.
